meanings.definition: The state or quality of not providing amusement or enjoyment.
meanings.sent1: The nonentertainment of the lecture made everyone sleepy.
meanings.sent2: The documentary on climate change was a nonentertainment for the kids.
meanings.sent3: The nonentertainment of the history lesson was like watching paint dry.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was a nonentertainment marathon that seemed never-ending.
meanings.sent5: The nonentertainment of the waiting room was torture for the anxious patients.

meanings.definition: Something that is not intended to entertain or amuse.
meanings.sent1: The textbook was a nonentertainment filled with facts and figures.
meanings.sent2: The meeting was a nonentertainment, just a list of rules and regulations.
meanings.sent3: The nonentertainment of the safety video was like a comedy show without jokes.
meanings.sent4: His speech was a nonentertainment, a monotonous drone in the background.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit was a nonentertainment, lacking any interactive elements.
